name: splitting
description: Microlibrary to split a DOM element's words & chars into elements populated with CSS vars.

scripts.build: npm run build:rollup && npm run build:uglify && npm run sizes
scripts.build:rollup: rollup src/splitting.js --output.format umd --name Splitting --output.file splitting.js --banner "/*! Splitting, ${npm_package_version} https://github.com/shshaw/splitting/ @license MIT */"
scripts.sizes: gzip -9 -c splitting.min.js | wc -c && cat splitting.min.js | wc -c

author: Stephen Shaw (stephen@brokensquare.com)
